description: FOUND THIS!!! It made so much sense to me!!! Just think about it!!! Really think about it!!! Where did most people learn about their history? School! Who taught the history? The white man! 🤔 seems very suspect to me!! Show me the slave ships!! Explain how a minority of people can colonise so many many countries where the majority were people of colour. How can such a dominant race just be wiped out like that?! They couldn’t do that to black people now and they have a checkered history of blanks. Yet when they were kings, queens, inventors, they could just enslave them for 400 years and degrade them in front of their people?! Sounds like a ‘White Fairytale’ to me🧐 wake tf up people!!! We are being manipulated on a large scale!!! I don’t know what the truth is but they haven’t given it to us yet. They are too scared!!! #revolution #is #coming #slaves #history #agenda21 #blackpower #truth #gossip #celeb #andrenochrome #nwo #politics #police #policebrutality #hillaryclinton #obama #ellendegeneres #justiceforbreonnataylor #justiceforahmaud #justiceforchildren #future #conspiracy
